main event: Observers in Kirksville, Missouri spotted a large, bright red light that behaved erratically in the sky.
interesting points: The object suddenly disappeared and reappeared in the west, then stopped and reversed direction, heading east.
When the object passed overhead, it disappeared in 2-3 seconds.
The witness reported seeing another similar object on February 22, 1967.
The observers were unable to determine the shape or size of the object, only observing the lights.
The object's flight path was described as moving in a south-easterly direction from Kirksville, then quickly reversing and heading north-westerly over the observers.
witnesses: 5 witnesses, including a meter reader for the Missouri Power and Light Company
